name: Holiday Apple Salad
author: Charlotte Hooper

ingredients.name: (8 oz) can crushed pineapple, juice included
cup dry roasted peanuts (light salted) finely crushed

instructions: Combine the first 5 ingredients in a saucepan. Cook slowly, stirring frequently until thick. Cool completely. While sauce is cooling, core and slice apples. Combine all ingredients, add cool whip, toss and refrigerate. This is a wonderful side dish to any holiday meal and can also be used as a dessert. It tastes just like candy apples.
